Sentencas: Direct-fired fuel cell gas turbine hybrid power system responses to open-loop transients were evaluated using a hardware-based simulation of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell gas turbine (SOFC/GT) hybrid system, implemented through the Hybrid Performance (Hyper) facility at the U.S. Department of Energy, National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL).
Titulo: Transfer function development for control of cathode airflow transients in fuel cell gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: A disturbance in the cathode inlet air mass flow was performed by manipulating a hot-air bypass valve implemented in the hardware component.
Titulo: Transfer function development for control of cathode airflow transients in fuel cell gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: Two tests were performed; the fuel cell stack subsystem numerical simulation model was both decoupled and fully coupled with the gas turbine hardware component.
Titulo: Transfer function development for control of cathode airflow transients in fuel cell gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: The dynamic responses of the entire SOFC/GT hybrid system were studied in this paper.
Titulo: Transfer function development for control of cathode airflow transients in fuel cell gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: The reduction of cathode airflow resulted in a sharp decrease and partial recovery of the fuel cell thermal effluent in 10 s.
Titulo: Transfer function development for control of cathode airflow transients in fuel cell gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: In contrast, the turbine rotational speed did not exhibit a similar trend.
Titulo: Transfer function development for control of cathode airflow transients in fuel cell gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: The transfer functions of several important variables in the fuel cell stack subsystem and gas turbine subsystem were developed to be used in the future control method development.
Titulo: Transfer function development for control of cathode airflow transients in fuel cell gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: The importance of the cathode airflow regulation was quantified through transfer functions.
Titulo: Transfer function development for control of cathode airflow transients in fuel cell gas turbine hybrid systems

Sentencas: The management of cathode airflow was also suggested to be a potential strategy to increase the life of fuel cells by reducing the thermal impact of operational transients on the fuel cell subsystem.
Titulo: Transfer function development for control of cathode airflow transients in fuel cell gas turbine hybrid systems
